Name: Cardio
Description: Any activity that elevates the heart rate.

Name: Weightlifting
Description: Weight training is a common type of strength training for developing the strength, size of skeletal muscles and maintenance of strength. It uses the force of gravity in the form of weighted bars, dumbbells or weight stacks in order to oppose the force generated by muscle through concentric or eccentric contraction.

Name: Balance/Flexibility
Description: Flexibility and balance exercises - which work stability muscles - can decrease the chance for muscle imbalances, which can throw off your body movement and open the door to falls and injuries.

Name: Yoga
Description: An ancient system of practices used to balance the mind and body through exercise, meditation (focusing thoughts), and control of breathing and emotions.
